summary:
1.It adds a new follower Eve.

2.You can find her at Jovarrsk.

3.If she has not a follower option just ~ and setrelationshiprank 14 3.

4.She will spawn with draugr armor (Aela's clothes) but you can dress her in your style.
If she wont wear your armor just upgrade ''this armor''
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][i]INSTALLATION
[/i][/size]just drag  eve.esp  and  eve.bsa to data folder



[size=6]REQUIREMENTS:[/size]
[size=4]oblivion hair pack fixed now with npc editor support (see requariments tab for link) and of caurse skyrim with the latest update


She will spawn at Jovvarsk (Whiterun) or if you are bored to find her just press ~ and help eve and then player.placeatme xxxxxxxxxxx where xxx is the npc number[/size]
author: Greek Warrior
